CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnMonster
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local monsterId = "model://f90a2a55-b877-415d-a708-0fe9fcefe813" local monsterName = "GoldenSlime_Chase" local x = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x local y = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.y local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/시작맵") local nextNum = #self.MonsterArray + 1 self.MonsterArray[nextNum] = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(monsterId, monsterName, Vector3(x,y,1), parent)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: GetCurMonsterCount
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local i = 1 while i <= #self.MonsterArray do if isvalid(self.MonsterArray[i]) == true then i = i + 1 else table.remove(self.MonsterArray,i) end end
return #self.MonsterArray

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.time = self.time + delta if self.time >= 2 then self.time = 0
local curMonsterCnt = self:GetCurMonsterCount() if curMonsterCnt == nil then return end if curMonsterCnt < self.MaxSpawnCount then self:SpawnMonster() end if curMonsterCnt > self.MaxSpawnCount then self.Entity:Destroy() end end
